Martial law in South Korea: President Yoon Suk Yeol declares emergency amid North threat https://www.nzherald.co.nz/world/martial-law-in-south-korea-president-yoon-suk-yeol-declares-emergency-amid-north-threat/LX2A3GO4JZFQ7G7CBAWU4LT47Q/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/world/martial-law-in-south-korea-president-yoon-suk-yeol-declares-emergency-amid-north-threat/LX2A3GO4JZFQ7G7CBAWU4LT47Q/ Kang Jin-kyuMPs unanimously vote to block martial law declaration and call for lifting. Tue, 03 Dec 2024 17:20:22 +0000 South Korean soldiers try get into the national assembly on December 04, 2024 in Seoul, South Korea. Yoon Suk Yeol announced he was taking the step, which enacts temporary rule by the military, during a televised speech on Tuesday, saying it was critical for defending the country's constitutional order. Since taking office two years ago, Mr Yoon has struggled to push his agendas against an opposition-controlled parliament. Photo /Getty Images
